metadata.name: [DREAM] Sola Aoi First NFT Project
metadata.description:
Limited Edition 1/1
Additional information：　https://aoisola-cryptoart.com/
Theme：　Anyone can challenge borderless regardless of national borders. With NFT.
The NFT art work [ Dream ] created by Sola Aoi.
She uses her whole body to put the life she has lived so far into the big canvas.
The "footprints" of ink left behind after the creation of the art will be engraved in the blockchain as "traces" of her life.
